name: Floating Adventure!
description:
This Game was made in about 3 hours for the Trijam #179 aand for the MiniJam 111!

The Theme of the Trijam was Floating Islands so I thought I made it the setting of this Platformer!

The Limitation of the Minijam was You are your own Enemy so depending on how many Enemies you kill you will get a specific End Screen!

I know it isn't a long Game or an innovative Concept but I learned a lot about Godots Area2D Node, so I thing it was worth the 3 hours and maybe I will continue updating it and make it better!

---CONTROLS---

Arrow Keys (Left/Right - Move; Up - Jump)
